api_list.name: /validate.php?action=validate&id={user@example.com}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rajr-check-mail-v1.p.rapidapi.com/validate.php?action=validate&id=abc@123.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rajr-check-mail-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rajr-check-mail-v1.p.rapidapi.com/validate.php?action=validate&id={useremail}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rajr-check-mail-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
